  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Frontend Developer (React, Next.js, TypeScript)",
  "description": "Soft Alliance is a highly-driven organization, motivated to help businesses run efficient processes and deliver services effectively. For over sixteen (16) years, we have delivered high-end IT services to many organizations. Through our diverse experience and expertise, we have led the largest ERP system implementation in both private and public sectors in West Africa and have implemented over 80% of the successful ERP implementations in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Frontend Developer (React, Next.js, TypeScript)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type:&nbsp;Full-Time

Job Summary


	Please make a brief statement regarding the important functions and responsibilities that comes with the job


Job Responsibilities


	Design and develop high-performance, responsive and accessible frontend applications.
	Work with the design and product teams to improve or establish the best and optimal User Interface Designs if required.
	Troubleshoot, debug and optimize frontend performance.
	Utilize best practices and standards for coding, testingand deployment to ensure quality, security, and maintain ability.
	Design and implement code tests to ensure features are working correctly.
	&nbsp;Integrate RESTful APIs, third-party services and libraries.
	Guide, mentor and collaborate with junior developers.
	Research and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in frontend development.
	Professional Certificates, licenses, and registrations that are required for this position


Requirements
Qualifications:


	B.Sc in Computer Science or Equivalent Competencies / skills for this position


Hard skills:


	React, Next.js, SCSS, TypeScript, Git, Redux, versioning.


Soft skills:


	Collaboration, mentor-ship, communication, innovation, time management.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@softalliance.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Frontend Developer (React, Next.js, TypeScript) Job at Soft Alliance




        
    

        
        Soft Alliance is a highly-driven organization, motivated to help businesses run efficient processes and deliver services effectively. For over sixteen (16) years, we have delivered high-end IT services to many organizations. Through our diverse experience and expertise, we have led the largest ERP system implementation in both private and public sectors in West Africa and have implemented over 80% of the successful ERP implementations in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Frontend Developer (React, Next.js, TypeScript)

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-Time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Please make a brief statement regarding the important functions and responsibilities that comes with the job


Job Responsibilities


	Design and develop high-performance, responsive and accessible frontend applications.
	Work with the design and product teams to improve or establish the best and optimal User Interface Designs if required.
	Troubleshoot, debug and optimize frontend performance.
	Utilize best practices and standards for coding, testingand deployment to ensure quality, security, and maintain ability.
	Design and implement code tests to ensure features are working correctly.
	 Integrate RESTful APIs, third-party services and libraries.
	Guide, mentor and collaborate with junior developers.
	Research and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in frontend development.
	Professional Certificates, licenses, and registrations that are required for this position


Requirements
Qualifications:


	B.Sc in Computer Science or Equivalent Competencies / skills for this position


Hard skills:


	React, Next.js, SCSS, TypeScript, Git, Redux, versioning.


Soft skills:


	Collaboration, mentor-ship, communication, innovation, time management.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@softalliance.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
